author: Reed Albergotti
title: Weed is deemed ‘essential’ in California, but many pot businesses are on the brink of failure - The Washington Post
description: The industry has been hammered by high taxes, local opposition to retail stores, the vaping crisis and more. The coronavirus creates a new opportunity and another potential crisis.
content: Theres no money thats going to be coming into the sector, says Nicholas Kovacevich, CEO of KushCo Holdings, a major distributor to marijuana dispensaries. All of these companies, including us, need to get profitable really quickly or risk running out of money… [+8733 chars]
